name: A Time At The Taco Store (Chapter One)
name_original: A Time At The Taco Store (Chapter One)
description:
WARNING: this is a scary game!!! and contains flashing lights.

Jeffy Makes a Big Mistake Leaving Home To Get His Midnight Taco.

Play as Jeffy with his sidekick DOFY DA FLASHLIGHT and  unravel the mystery of the Taco Store.

NOTE: this is only chapter one so it is very short and gives very little information about the taco store. Also this is the first version so there will be a lot of bugs.
